item.description: Introduction Related Work Model Discriminator Generator Locator Seed Selection Experiments Targeted Community Detection Conclusion 今天介绍的是我们在KDD'20的一篇paper：SEAL: Learning Heuristics for Community Detection with Generative Adversarial Networks。这篇工作将GAN、d
